1.title: Eamonn & Ruth Take Monte Carlo

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: The couple visit the playground of the super-rich, Monte Carlo. Former F1 team boss Flavio Briatore invites them to his exclusive club, they discover how little property 30 million dollars will buy and visit the world famous casino.

2.title: Eamonn and Ruth Look a Million Dollars

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Eamonn and Ruth investigate the beauty regimes of the super-rich. They meet a reality TV star who has spent a fortune on cosmetic surgery, a designer to the stars and Ruth visits an exclusive children's clothing store.

3.title: The Millionaire's Rulebook

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Do Vegas

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Eamonn and Ruth hit Vegas checking into the Palms Casino Hotel, go shopping at Michael Jackson favourite boutique, meet a 90-year-old burlesque dancer who dated Elvis, learn how to play blackjack and attend a Sin City wedding.

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Eamonn shares a private jet with a Russian oligarch, Ruth goes shopping with Nigerian high-society ladies and the pair attend an exclusive event for the super-rich.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: The couple delve into British high-society, meeting the multi-millionaires who have used their wealth to buy stately homes, create their own polo clubs and send their children to the top schools.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Eamonn and Ruth get the chance to nosy around a twenty million pound mansion belonging to a multi-millionaire complete with its own bowling alley, golf course, football pitch and cinema.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Eamonn and Ruth speak to Chris Dawson, the founder of retail chain The Range. They also attend the Tusk Trust charity gala, organised by entrepreneur and "Dragon's Den" star Deborah Meaden.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Eamonn Holmes and Ruth Langsford visit a £30 million hotel, talk to one of the world's leading interior designers Kelly Hoppen and are shown around luxury super-yachts in Ibiza.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Eamonn and Ruth meet some of the self-made millionaires who have made their fortunes by providing the mega-rich with all the luxury food, drink and services they desire.

1.title: In New York

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: The couple travel to New York, which is reportedly home to more billionaires than anywhere else in the world. They experience luxury penthouse apartments, designer homes in the Hamptons and the world's most expensive ice cream.

2.title: Episode #2.2

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Eamonn gets a behind-the-scenes tour of West Ham United courtesy of one of Britain's newest billionaires, David Sullivan. Ruth tries on a £1.4 million watch and meets with a diamond dealer to learn about a girl's best friend.

3.title: Episode #2.3

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: The couple travel to Kiev to meet Dr Mohammad Zahoor and his wife Kamaliya to see how the billionaire couple have spent some of their wealth on 12 homes around the globe, a fleet of Bentleys and their own personal security force.

4.title: Episode #2.4

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Eamonn and Ruth investigate the effects having great wealth can have on families. They visit Belvoir Castle, home of Emma Manners - the Duchess of Rutland who reveals she faces an annual bill of a million pounds to run the place.

5.title: Episode #2.5

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: King of the Gypsies, Alfie Best now has an estimated 160m pounds. Poker pro Liv Boeree talks about the risks of the high-roller's table, and the creator of Moshi Monsters shares his story.

6.title: Blowing A Fortune

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Ruth meets milliner to the stars Louis Mariette, Eamonn checks out a Bugatti Veyron and the pair find out about Regent's Park.

7.title: A Million Pound Christmas

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: In this special festive edition of the show Eamonn Holmes and Ruth Langsford discover the most luxurious and expensive ways in which to enjoy Christmas and what gifts to buy for someone who has everything.

1.title: Do Dubai

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Eamonn Holmes and Ruth Langsford head to the largest city in the United Arab Emirates. After experiencing a luxury night under the stars in the desert they visit the world's tallest building.

2.title: Silver Service

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: The couple delve into the world of the landed gentry, clay pigeon shooting with hand engraved shotguns worth 100,000 pounds each. The Queen's former butler instructs them in the art of etiquette and they attend the Debutante's Ball.

3.title: Russian Roulette

episode of.title: Eamonn and Ruth: How the Other Half Lives (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Eamonn and Ruth head to Moscow to investigate the lives of billionaire oligarchs. They meet the son of one of Russia's richest men and Eamonn blags an invite to a lavish birthday party.

plot: Husband and wife duo 'Eamonn Holmes' (qv) and 'Ruth Langsford' (qv) shed light on the lives of the super-rich.::Mark_a_Wood <markawood@hotmail.co.uk>
